nodes.long_description:
**🦈🦈  THE FIN-TASTIC SALVAGE COMPANY UPDATE🦈🦈**
Collect hidden treasures and send them up for a reward: will you work together, or make it every shark for themselves?

✅ You're a shark
✅ Hang out with friends
✅ Proximity voice chat
✅ Public and Private lobbies/rooms
✅ 100's of cosmetics to express your true shark

🦈 **You're a shark**: use your mouth to bite, grab, carry, place, build and attack in this multiplayer physics sandbox game. 

🦈 **Swim around** to collect hidden treasures and send them up to the FIN-TASTIC SALVAGE COMPANY for a reward: will you work together, or make it every shark for themselves?

🦈 **Unique third-person VR locomotion system** that only needs your head and one controller, plus you can play sitting, standing or room-scale.

🦈 **Do everything with your mouth** (you're a shark so you don't have hands): grab, carry, fling, place, build, open, activate, attack and (of course) eat!

🦈 **Visit the Shark Shop**, with a rotating inventory of items to unlock and wear to express your true shark.

🦈 **Play with your non-VR friends** on the flat-screen version. Each game is a quick snack-sized round so it's perfect to just drop-in or -out whenever you've got a spare minute.

🦈 **Sharks is Early Access** which means we are constantly adding new updates based on your feedback. Visit our ezone.com/discord to connect with other players, influence the design of the final game and collect free in-game perks.
nodes.short_description:
🦈🦈 THE FIN-TASTIC SALVAGE COMPANY UPDATE 🦈🦈
Collect hidden treasures and send them up for a reward: will you work together, or make it every shark for themselves?

✅ You're a shark
✅ Hang out with friends
✅ Proximity voice chat
✅ Public and Private lobbies/rooms
✅ 100's of cosmetics to express your true shark

🦈 You're a shark: use your mouth to grab, carry, fling, place, build, open, activate, attack and (of course) eat with your friends in this multiplayer physics sandbox game 🦈

nodes.long_description:
Eat your friends in 'SHARKS' a cross-platform (PC and VR) multiplayer hunting game. Hunt with groups of up to 10 people online. Eat whatever you can to survive and avoid the zombie sharks: last player standing wins. It's like Gorilla Tag with sharks.

The VR controls are super responsive (it feels like a human-shark mind meld): simply look where you want the shark to swim. Pull the trigger to move forward, press the grip button to chomp/eat things.
nodes.short_description: Eat your friends in 'SHARKS' a cross-platform (PC and VR) multiplayer hunting game. Hunt with groups of up to 10 people online. Eat whatever you can to survive and avoid the zombie sharks: last player standing wins. It's like Gorilla Tag with sharks.

nodes.change_log:
Release Notes - v0.1.24 - "THE FIN-TASTIC SALVAGE COMPANY"

Collect hidden treasures and send them up for a reward: will you work together, or make it every shark for themselves?

The FIN-TASTIC SALVAGE COMPANY is now open for business! Search all around for items to collect and put them in the reward cage. When you've collected enough treasure send it up for a reward. But watch out! When the reward arrives it's first in best dressed: anyone can claim the prize, so do whatever it takes to get there first.

We've also added proximity chat and private rooms, so you can play and chat with your friends. To enable voice chat you will need to give the game permission to use your microphone. When using voice chat please be respectful and considerate to other players - anyone who doesn't risks being banned from the game.

If you own a premium skin (like the Founders or Squidian Skins) you can create private rooms with a custom PIN that you can provide to your friends so they can join you (note: friends don't need to own a premium skin to join your private room).

New:
- The FIN-TASTIC SALVAGE COMPANY is open for business
- Tons of new salvage items to collect for rewards
- Proximity voice chat: talk with friends while playing
- Shark mouth moves while talking
- Mute menu: Ability to mute players
- Private rooms: anyone with the PIN can join a private multiplayer room
- Premium skin perk: create private multiplayer rooms
- Premium skin perk: reward chests recharge instantly
- Wearing the VR goggles now doubles some rewards
- More environmental sounds (when objects bump into sharks and each other)
- Networked biteable doors: open and close them with your mouth
- Reward cage: fill with items and send up for a reward
- Reward goldfish: anyone can get them!
- Random salvage items spawn in
- Controller haptics when biting and taking damage

Fixes:
- Terms of Service agreement on start-up
- Lobby always shows a room option
- Sandcastle: added random goldfish
- Sandcastle: expanded area
- Sandcastle: updated lighting
- Settings: Master volume control
- Settings: Voice volume control
- Limited cannons per map
- Cannon firing tweaked
- Adjusted mouse sensitivity for flat-screen version
- Items in the reward cage can pass through the water surface layer
- Levers changed to biteable horns
- Moved Audio Listener to the shark's head (rather than the camera)

If you love playing SHARKS then buy some skins or get a goldfish pack to show your support. All proceeds go right back into the game: new game modes, customizable items, maps, interactable creatures and objects and multiplayer servers.

Thanks so much for playing and please tell your friends: word of mouth is the best way to get more players in the game!

If you have any feedback or comments, please come chat in the Discord (https://ezone.com/discord). Cheers!

- Simon and Jamie

Release Notes - v0.1.23 - "SANDCASTLE"

Master all the twists and turns in the new Sandcastle map. Strategically place cannons to inflict maximum damage: who knows what's waiting around the corner!

New:
- New Map: Sandcastle
- New Weapon: place cannons to fire at any sharks in range
- More chest quests
- More stats

Fixes:
- Sharks drop items if they take damage
- Tire physics material
- Added 'Restore Purchases' in Settings

If you love playing SHARKS then buy some skins or get a goldfish pack to show your support. All proceeds go right back into the game: new game modes, customizable items, maps, interactable creatures and objects and multiplayer servers.

Thanks so much for playing and please tell your friends: word of mouth is the best way to get more players in the game!

If you have any feedback or comments, please come chat in the Discord (https://ezone.com/discord). Cheers!

- Simon and Jamie

Release Notes - v0.1.22 - "SUPER COLLIDER"

Finally, after almost two years of working on it we have a super robust collision system for the sharks. Not only does this mean your shark will be easier to control in tight spots (like caves, sunken ships, containers, etc), but it will also be able to wiggle through small openings while still being confined to the play area. It's also easier to throw objects more accurately. 

Even though it may seem like a minor update, this new system opens up the potential for some really cool and interesting future maps and game modes. Super!

New:
- Rebuilt shark motion and collision system based on rigidbodies and physics

Fixes:
- Easier to throw objects more accurately
- Snap turn check for valid position
- Sharks outside the boundary fix
- Increased alien bomb lock-on distance

If you love playing SHARKS then buy some skins or get a goldfish pack to show your support. All proceeds go right back into the game: new game modes, customizable items, maps, interactable creatures and objects and multiplayer servers.

Thanks so much for playing and please tell your friends: word of mouth is the best way to get more players in the game!

If you have any feedback or comments, please come chat in the Discord (https://ezone.com/discord). Cheers!

- Simon and Jamie

Release Notes - v0.1.21 - "LOBBY HOT FIX"

A quick fix to make sure you can see all the rooms available in the lobby. Also a tweak to the shark collider so you can access small spaces like the the ship window in the Original map and the OG wormhole (if you know, you know!)

New:
- New Weapon: Alien lock-on bomb added to Original map

Fixes:
- Scroll bar added to lobby view
- Shark collider fixed for accessing smaller spaces
- Updated to Meta XR SDK v.74.0.2

If you love playing SHARKS then buy some skins or get a goldfish pack to show your support. All proceeds go right back into the game: new game modes, customizable items, maps, interactable creatures and objects and multiplayer servers.

Thanks so much for playing and please tell your friends: word of mouth is the best way to get more players in the game!

If you have any feedback or comments, please come chat in the Discord (https://ezone.com/discord). Cheers!

- Simon and Jamie

Release Notes - v0.1.20 - "MEET YOU IN THE LOBBY"

We've made it easier than ever for you to play with your friends in SHARKS: there is now a multiplayer lobby that lists all the open rooms so you can see how many players are in each and what map and game mode is set. You can also create your own room and let your friends know where to meet you.

New:
- Multiplayer Lobby: view and join existing rooms
- Multiplayer: create or choose room
- Multiplayer: choose map
- Multiplayer: choose mode
- New Map: Alien
- New Mode: Free Mode
- New Weapon: Alien bomb locks-on to the nearest shark
- New Challenge: Collect squidians and send them home
- More unlockable skins and hats
- Steam: purchase skins and goldfish packs
- More diver jokes

Fixes:
- Increased snap turn speed x10
- Main map is now called 'Original' and has been tweaked for improved performance
- Cannonball explodes instantly on impact
- Improved shark physics and colliders
- Improved physics and interactions between objects: set off even more crazy chain reactions with jellyfish, mines, bombs, etc
- Zombie fix to reset the last player in a room
- Improved restoring items purchased outside the app

If you love playing SHARKS then buy some skins or get a goldfish pack to show your support. All proceeds go right back into the game: new game modes, customizable items, maps, interactable creatures and objects and multiplayer servers.

Thanks so much for playing and please tell your friends: word of mouth is the best way to get more players in the game!

If you have any feedback or comments, please come chat in the Discord (https://ezone.com/discord). Cheers!

- Simon and Jamie
